restrictionInstructions.dataDistribution: DISTRIBUTION STATEMENT D: DISTRIBUTION AUTHORIZED TO DOD AND DOD CONTRACTORS ONLY. CRITICAL TECHNOLOGY, JULY 2012. OTHER REQUESTS SHALL BE REFERRED TO NAVSEA 07L. NO SECONDARY DISTRIBUTION AUTHORIZED WITHOUT WRITTEN APPROVAL OF THE APPLICABLE NAVSEA PROGRAM MANAGEMENT OFFICE.

exportRegistrationStmt.simplePara: WARNING: THIS DOCUMENT CONTAINS TECHNICAL DATA WHOSE EXPORT IS RESTRICTED BY THE ARMS EXPORT CONTROL ACT (TITLE 22, U.S.C., SEC. 2751, ET SEQ.) OR THE EXPORT ADMINISTRATION ACT OF 1979, AS AMENDED, TITLE 50, U.S.C. APP. 2401 ET. SEQ. VIOLATIONS OF THESE EXPORT LAWS ARE SUBJECT TO SEVERE CRIMINAL PENALTIES. DISSEMINATE IN ACCORDANCE WITH PROVISIONS OF OPNAVINST 5510.161.

restrictionInstructions.dataDestruction: DESTRUCTION NOTICE: DESTROY BY ANY METHOD THAT WILL PREVENT DISCLOSURE OF CONTENTS OR RECONSTRUCTION OF THE DOCUMENT.

dmTitle.infoName: Default business rules exchange data module

entry.para: (U) Refer to and direct trainee to refer to SUBMARINE 2-18 FR:Atlantic:Submarine Force US Atlantic Fleet:SSN 0774:EA01:5154/974 --Integrated Low Pressure Electrolyzer (ILPE) Unit
(U) RCU Regulator Valve Flow Test (MRC S-2)
(U) Refer to and direct trainee to refer to SUBMARINE 2-18 FR:Atlantic:Submarine Force US Atlantic Fleet:SSN 0774:EA01:5154/974 --Integrated Low Pressure Electrolyzer (ILPE) Unit:9QNU (MRC S-2)
(U) Reference ILPE RCU Simulator Operation Manual (6-15-15), ILPE RCU Simulator Operation Manual.
(U) Direct trainee to adhere to all applicable safety precautions while in the Lab.
(U) Direct trainee to perform SUBMARINE 2-18 FR:Atlantic:Submarine Force US Atlantic Fleet:SSN 0774:EA01:5154/974 --Integrated Low Pressure Electrolyzer (ILPE) Unit:9QNU (MRC S-2)

note.notePara: (U) Guide the students through the MRC using the ILPE RCU Simulator Operation Manual for the test as required.

entry.para: (U) Reference SUBMARINE 2-18 FR:Atlantic:Submarine Force US Atlantic Fleet:SSN 0774:EA01:5154/974 --Integrated Low Pressure Electrolyzer (ILPE) Unit:9QPB (MRC LU-1)
(U) Refer to and direct trainee to refer to SUBMARINE 2-18 FR:Atlantic:Submarine Force US Atlantic Fleet:SSN 0774:EA01:5154/974 --Integrated Low Pressure Electrolyzer (ILPE) Unit:9QPB (MRC LU-1)
(U) Direct trainee to complete A-652-0093-ICW-MECH MAINT, Integrated Low Pressure Electrolyzer Mechanical Maintenance (Apr 2008), Preventive Maintenance Lesson: BMP Catalyst De-activation.
(U) Reference NAWCTSD P-8437, ILPE FPS Trainer Manual,
(U) Prepare the ILPE Front Panel Simulator for use.
(U) Refer to NAWCTSD P-8437 for ILPE FPS operation

note.notePara: (U) Complete the deactivation lab together as a group.

entry.para: (U) Direct trainee to adhere to all applicable safety precautions while in the Lab.
(U) Direct trainee to perform SUBMARINE 2-18 FR:Atlantic:Submarine Force US Atlantic Fleet:SSN 0774:EA01:5154/974 --Integrated Low Pressure Electrolyzer (ILPE) Unit:9QPB (MRC LU-1)
(U) Clean ILPE Collector Float Assembly (MRC R-6) and Catalyst Change (MRC R-7)

note.notePara: (U) The Labs for both of these MRCs will be performed at the same time. One lab group will perform R-6 and the other lab group will perform R-7. The two groups will swap MRCs when they have finished. The procedures for both will be taught in the classroom first.

entry.para: (U) Refer to and direct trainee to refer to SUBMARINE 2-18 FR:Atlantic:Submarine Force US Atlantic Fleet:SSN 0774:EA01:5154/974 --Integrated Low Pressure Electrolyzer (ILPE) Unit:9QPA (MRC R-6)
(U) Refer to and direct trainee to refer to SUBMARINE 2-18 FR:Atlantic:Submarine Force US Atlantic Fleet:SSN 0774:EA01:5154/974 --Integrated Low Pressure Electrolyzer (ILPE) Unit:F7FJ (MRC-R-7)
(U) Prepare the ILPE Front Panel Simulator for use. Ensure the applicable tools are made available to the students.
(U) Refer to NAWCTSD P-8437 for ILPE FPS operation
(U) Direct trainee to adhere to all applicable safety precautions while in the Lab.
(U) Direct trainee to perform SUBMARINE 2-18 FR:Atlantic:Submarine Force US Atlantic Fleet:SSN 0774:EA01:5154/974 --Integrated Low Pressure Electrolyzer (ILPE) Unit:F7FJ (MRC-R-7)

note.notePara: (U) The students should verify that all of the procedures have been completed for Converter Access. These should have been conducted during the previous Lab.

entry.para: (U) Prepare the ILPE Front Panel Simulator for use. Ensure the applicable tools are made available to the students.
(U) Refer to NAWCTSD P-8437 for ILPE FPS operation
(U) Direct trainee to adhere to all applicable safety precautions while in the Lab.

(U) Direct trainee to perform SUBMARINE 2-18 FR:Atlantic:Submarine Force US Atlantic Fleet:SSN 0774:EA01:5154/974 --Integrated Low Pressure Electrolyzer (ILPE) Unit:9QPA Clean ILPE Collector Float Assembly (MRC R-6)
(U) Refer to and direct trainee to refer to S9515-AL-MMA-0106.3 REPAIRS.
(U) (MRC R-13) Calibrate ILPE Pressure and Differential Pressure Transducers (Mandatory Related to R-6 and R-7)
(U) Refer to and direct trainee to refer to SUBMARINE 2-18 FR:Atlantic:Submarine Force US Atlantic Fleet:SSN 0774:EA01:5154/974 --Integrated Low Pressure Electrolyzer (ILPE) Unit:E5BG (MRC U-7)
(U) Refer to and direct trainee to refer to S9515-AL-MMA-0102.4 OPERATING PROCEDURES.
(U) Refer to and direct trainee to refer to SUBMARINE 2-18 FR:Atlantic:Submarine Force US Atlantic Fleet:SSN 0774:EA01:5154/974 --Integrated Low Pressure Electrolyzer (ILPE) Unit:9QPD (MRC SU-1)
(U) Direct trainee to complete A-652-0093-ICW-MECH MAINT, Integrated Low Pressure Electrolyzer Mechanical Maintenance (Apr 2008), Preventive Maintenance Lesson: BMP Catalyst Activation.
(U) Direct the "off-lab"group to complete PMS ICW Lessons for DP 4e1 and 4e2.
(U) Prepare the ILPE Front Panel Simulator for use. Ensure the applicable tools are made available to the students.
(U) Refer to NAWCTSD P-8437 for ILPE FPS operation
(U) Direct trainee to adhere to all applicable safety precautions while in the Lab.
(U) Direct trainee to perform SUBMARINE 2-18 FR:Atlantic:Submarine Force US Atlantic Fleet:SSN 0774:EA01:5154/974 --Integrated Low Pressure Electrolyzer (ILPE) Unit:E5BG (MRC U-7)
(U) Direct trainee to perform S9515-AL-MMA-0102.4 OPERATING PROCEDURES.
(U) Direct trainee to perform SUBMARINE 2-18 FR:Atlantic:Submarine Force US Atlantic Fleet:SSN 0774:EA01:5154/974 --Integrated Low Pressure Electrolyzer (ILPE) Unit:9QPD (MRC SU-1)

(U) Refer to and direct trainee to refer to SUBMARINE 2-18 FR:Atlantic:Submarine Force US Atlantic Fleet:SSN 0774:EA01:5154/974 --Integrated Low Pressure Electrolyzer (ILPE) Unit:9QNK ILPE Combustible Gas Sensor Zero Drift Test (MRC M-2)
(U) Calibrate ILPE Combustible Gas Sensor (MRC Q-4)

(U) Refer to and direct trainee to refer to SUBMARINE 2-18 FR:Atlantic:Submarine Force US Atlantic Fleet:SSN 0774:EA01:5154/974 --Integrated Low Pressure Electrolyzer (ILPE) Unit:9QNP ILPE Combustible Gas Sensor Calibration (MRC Q-4)
(U) Prepare the ILPE Front Panel Simulator for use. Ensure the applicable tools are made available to the students.
(U) Refer to NAWCTSD P-8437 for ILPE FPS operation

note.notePara: (U) Direct the "off-lab"group to complete PMS ICW Lesson.

entry.para: (U) Direct trainee to adhere to all applicable safety precautions while in the Lab.

(U) Direct trainee to perform SUBMARINE 2-18 FR:Atlantic:Submarine Force US Atlantic Fleet:SSN 0774:EA01:5154/974 --Integrated Low Pressure Electrolyzer (ILPE) Unit:9QNK ILPE Combustible Gas Sensor Zero Drift Test (MRC M-2)
(U) Calibrate ILPE Combustible Gas Sensor (MRC Q-4)

(U) Direct trainee to perform SUBMARINE 2-18 FR:Atlantic:Submarine Force US Atlantic Fleet:SSN 0774:EA01:5154/974 --Integrated Low Pressure Electrolyzer (ILPE) Unit:9QNQ ILPE Combustible Gas Sensor Calibration (MRC Q-4)

note.notePara: (U) These three ICW lessons are designed to give "off-lab" groups something to do while the other group is in the lab.

entry.para: (U) Drain Condensate From Blower Motor Housing (MRC R-10W Procedure 2)

(U) Reference SUBMARINE 2-18 FR:Atlantic:Submarine Force US Atlantic Fleet:SSN 0774:EA01:5154/974 --Integrated Low Pressure Electrolyzer (ILPE) Unit:9QNH Drain Condensate From Blower Motor Housing (MRC R-10W Procedure 2)

(U) Direct trainee to complete A-652-0093-ICW-MECH MAINT, Integrated Low Pressure Electrolyzer Mechanical Maintenance (Apr 2008), Preventive Maintenance Lesson: Drain Condensate from Blower Motor Housing.
(U) Flush Recirculation Loop,Replace Recirculation Loop Filter, and Replace D/I Bed (MRC Q-1)

(U) Reference SUBMARINE 2-18 FR:Atlantic:Submarine Force US Atlantic Fleet:SSN 0774:EA01:5154/974 --Integrated Low Pressure Electrolyzer (ILPE) Unit:9QNL (MRC Q-1) Flush Recirculation Loop,Replace Recirculation Loop Filter, and Replace D/I Bed
(U) Direct trainee to complete A-652-0093-ICW-MECH MAINT, Integrated Low Pressure Electrolyzer Mechanical Maintenance (Apr 2008), Preventive Maintenance Lesson: Flush Recirculation Loop.
(U) Reference SUBMARINE 2-18 FR:Atlantic:Submarine Force US Atlantic Fleet:SSN 0774:EA01:5154/974 --Integrated Low Pressure Electrolyzer (ILPE) Unit:9QNV (MRC 36M-5) Replace ASU Rupture Disk Assembly
(U) Direct trainee to complete A-652-0093-ICW-MECH MAINT, Integrated Low Pressure Electrolyzer Mechanical Maintenance (Apr 2008), Preventive Maintenance Lesson: Replace Rupture Disk Assembly.
